DOC.brief_summary: The study compare Concord grape juice beverage contain grape flavonoid , similar appearance taste ( placebo juice ) . A total 60 overweight obese participant age 50 enrol . Each participant drink beverage 4 week 2-week rest period two beverage consumption period . The order beverage ( grape juice first placebo juice first ) randomize . The investigator use ultrasound measure brachial artery flow-mediated dilation , measure endothelial vasodilator function . The investigator also collect blood sample ass cardiovascular effect grape juice . The aim study determine whether Concord grape juice improve endothelial function patient risk cardiovascular disease may provide information would guide dietary recommendation . The result may also use sponsor substantiate claim label product .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Concord Grape Juice Endothelial Function
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ≥ 25 < 40 kg/m2 Age ≥ 50 year Otherwise healthy Clinical diagnosis atherosclerotic vascular disease . Clinical history diabetes mellitus fast glucose ≥126 mg/dl Uncontrolled hypertension Treatment investigational new drug within last 30 day Clinical history major illness include endstage cancer , renal failure , hepatic failure , condition opinion principal investigator make study inappropriate Psychological illness condition interfere subject 's ability understand requirement study Use Vitamin E , Vitamin C , beta carotene , lipoic acid , food herbal supplement within 1 month enrollment . Subjects take multivitamin form vitamin E C dose exceed two time recommend daily allowance exclude Extreme dietary habit ( i.e . Atkins , high protein/low carbohydrate , vegan diet
